Package com.atakmap.map.elevation.quadtree

Class ElevationQuadTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.elevation.quadtree.ElevationQuadTree
  • @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="5.3",
               forRemoval=true,
               removeAt="5.6")
public class ElevationQuadTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Deprecated.
    use TerrainRenderService API
    This object represents a quad tree implementation that allows the storage of elevation data in grid aligned nodes where lower nodes can provide more detailed grid representations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ElevationQuadTree()
      Deprecated.
      This is the constructor for the quad tree

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getElevation​(double latitude, double longitude, int maxLevel)
      Deprecated.
      This will get the interpolated elevation at the given location up to the max level
      ElevationNode getElevationNode​(double latitude, double longitude, int maxLevel)
      Deprecated.
      This will get the node at the given latitude and longitude that is either at the max level or is the lowest data node that is resolved or the first data node that is also not resolved
      void pruneTree()
      Deprecated.
      This will cause the tree to be pruned so that old data nodes are removed and the tree becomes thinner

    • Method Detail

      • getElevationNode

        public ElevationNode getElevationNode​(double latitude,
                                      double longitude,
                                      int maxLevel)
        Deprecated.
        This will get the node at the given latitude and longitude that is either at the max level or is the lowest data node that is resolved or the first data node that is also not resolved
        Parameters:
        latitude - The latitude to get the node for
        longitude - The longitude to get the node for
        maxLevel - The max level of the node to return
        Returns:
        The node at the given location

      • getElevation

        public double getElevation​(double latitude,
                           double longitude,
                           int maxLevel)
        Deprecated.
        This will get the interpolated elevation at the given location up to the max level
        Parameters:
        latitude - The latitude to get the elevation for
        longitude - The longitude to get the elevation for
        maxLevel - The max level of the node to return
        Returns:
        The elevation at the given location or Double.NaN if the elevation is unknown or hasn't been computed yet

      • pruneTree

        public void pruneTree()
        Deprecated.
        This will cause the tree to be pruned so that old data nodes are removed and the tree becomes thinner
